715.question: To what other competitive baselines is this approach compared?
715.response: {'Answer': 'The proposed approach is compared to the following baselines: LSTM, LSTM (attn), HRED, VHRED, VHRED (attn), Reranking-RL, MMI, MinAvgOut, LFT and RL.'}
715.answer: LSTMs with and without attention, HRED, VHRED with and without attention, MMI and Reranking-RL

717.question: How much better were results of the proposed models than base LSTM-RNN model?
717.response: {'Answer': 'The MinAvgOut model significantly outperformed the baseline LSTM-RNN model across all metrics including iAUCs, iAUC-1, iAUC-2, iAUC-3, iAUC-avg, Distinct-1, Distinct-2, Activity F1, and Entity F1.'}
717.answer: on diversity 6.87 and on relevance 4.6 points higher
